00000.title: Hypothesis vs theory
00000.description: What is the difference between a hypothesis and a theory?

comments.name: Terry
comments.description: A hypothesis is a proposed explanation, a theory is a well-substantiated explanation.

00001.title: Circulatory System
00001.description: How does the circulatory system work?

comments.name: Alex
comments.description: Blood carries oxygen and nutrients to body cells, and removes waste products, via the heart.

comments.name: Leo
comments.description: I needed this too, thanks a bunch!

00002.title: DNA Question
00002.description: I'm interested in learning more about how DNA works. Could you explain the structure of DNA to me, including the function and location of the different components? Additionally, how does the structure of DNA relate to the process of DNA replication?

comments.name: Intellixis
comments.description: DNA is a molecule that stores genetic information, has a double helix structure made of nucleotides,
